sentence: Coty Inc. ( COTY ) will begin trading ex-dividend on August 30, 2017.
A cash dividend payment of $0.125 per share is scheduled to be paid on September 14, 2017.
Shareholders who purchased COTY prior to the ex-dividend date are eligible for the cash dividend payment.
This marks the 4th quarter that COTY has paid the same dividend.
At the current stock price of $16.09, the dividend yield is 3.11%.
The previous trading day's last sale of COTY was $16.09, representing a -42.49% decrease from the 52 week high of $27.98 and a 1.64% increase over the 52 week low of $15.83.
COTY is a part of the Consumer Non-Durables sector, which includes companies such as Procter & Gamble Company ( PG ) and Unilever NV ( UN ).
COTY's current earnings per share, an indicator of a company's profitability, is -$.57.
Zacks Investment Research reports COTY's forecasted earnings growth in 2018 as 8.93%, compared to an industry average of 15.4%.
For more information on the declaration, record and payment dates, visit the COTY Dividend History page.
Our Dividend Calendar has the full list of stocks that have an ex-dividend today.
